messages.name: ServerMsg
messages.message: 该账号正在登陆中。请稍后重新尝试。
重复的工作阶段识别码。
发生Hackshield相关错误。请咨询安博士客服。(TEL 02-2186-3000 / hs@ahnlab.com)
角色名无法使用特殊字符。
系统判断您是未认证账号，请到pwd.sdo.com网站进行防沉迷信息补填。
您的账号还没有进行成年认证，请到pwd.sdo.com网站进行认证。
不能删除担任公会会长的人物。
NexonPassport is valid, but arleady expired
no server information in config file
client ip address is mismatched with sso servers data
There is no passport decryption key. Check AuthCheck_LoadKey function or key file.
passport level is lower than minimum passport level
Mismatch between the caller's gamecode and the passport's gamecode.
User session data not exists.(Maybe timeout or something.)
User IP or session key missmatched with current login session. Maybe logged out by another session.
